description:
Hakone`s friend Iono comes to see Sendo, however he becomes extremely cautious. Iono came to express her love for Sendo, disregarding her other ongoing relationship with someone at her school, causing a chaos to breakout. Hearing this situation from Sendo, Hakone goes to confront Iono to explain why her brother acted the way he did...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 依緒乃, クライシス
